translations: v．用踏板操作：通过踩踏踏板来驱动或控制机器或设备。
她用脚踩踏板操作缝纫机。

sentences.sentence: Objective: to explore the clinical effects of acne treadled by traditional Chinese medicine and external treatment of skin to observe the influence on the index of immunology.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨用中药内服配合皮肤外治法治疗痤疮的临床疗效及对免疫学指标的影响。
